The central class of IrrConfigController This class is used to provide the use configurable Irrlicht controller. Detailed Description

The central class of IrrConfigController This class is used to provide the use configurable Irrlicht controller. Controller items can be defined, and the user will be able to change the controls using a GUI provided by this class. Controls can be grouped into several sets, but this does only influence the creation of the GUI.

virtual bool CIrrCC::OnEvent ( const SEvent &  event  )  [virtual]

This is the event handler to update the item's values. You can either set the instance of the class as irrlicht event receiver or call this method from your own event receiving code.

Parameters:
event the event to be handled
Returns:
"true" if the event was processed, "false" otherwise
